content: hello to all crocheters out there all the world is made of faith and trust and pixie dust… and a wee bit of yarn being a grandmother i have entered my second childhood and i will never grow up i have an easy pattern that i made a few years back it is an indoor flying doily or if you prefer a frisbee it uses us terminology and is free to all well i ve got to fly second star to the right and straight on until morning pan *** a big thank you to dedri at look what i made for helping me publish this pattern
